GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.158
GSD.description:
tipc: re-fetch skb cb after tipc_msg_validate

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.158 by commit a1ba595e35aa3afbe417ff0af353afb9f65559c0, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit fc1b6d6de2208774efd2a20bf0daddb02d18b1e0. For more details please see the references link.
